channel.title: Safest way
channel.description: Well, my pubes have grown long, and after shaving them once, I know that was the most retarded thing ever, it was itchy, people thought I was jacking off, anyways. I know im supposed to trim them. But to what height?

item.title: Safest way
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

What I’ve always done is when it’s grown in thick. I just use a pair of trimming scissors to thin it out to a reasonable amount, then take a razor and some shaving cream and just get the broad areas. After that I take an electric razor, or a nose hair trimmer and get the delicate areas. Be careful shaving your gouch though. If you cut a main artery it’ll be embarrassing to explain it to your family, not to mention the death factor.

To take care of the pain of the hairs like poking you, just wash that area rub in a circular motion, then blow dry it on warm, still rubbing in circular motions.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:10, topic:223780”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=293945.msg2365422#msg2365422 date=1217911318]
Did you seriously just ask how to trim pubes?
[/quote]

Yes

I don’t want to hurt myself. :rolleyes:[/quote]

Use those little scissors you use to cut fingernails. Just cut your pubes to a nice length above your dick and just try and make the rest of your pubic area about the same length so your pubes don’t look uneven.

And don’t shave your pubes, you’ll look like you’re 11 (but with a bigger dick).

This man speaks the truth!

Yeah, I am currently feeling the effect of shaving

Lmao noob at pubic care.

[/quote]
It’s my 5th time doing it, 4 of the other times it never itched because I did it properly, with cream etc.

This time I just hacked them the fuck off with a razor looool. It’s embarrassing because I walk around wanting to itch all day :([/quote]
Last year, like a week before camp, i just randomly cut mine off. It itched like hell.
